prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Dr. Turner Grey
Description: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
Character 2
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
Character 3
Name: Morgan Fey
Description: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
Character 4
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Ini Miney
Description: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
Character 7
Name: Mimi Miney
Description: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.
Character 8
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.
Character 9
Name: Franziska von Karma
Description: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.
Character 10
Name: Ami Fey
Description: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.
Character 11
Name: Director Hotti (purported)
Description: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
Description: A diagram of Fey Manor. Meditation room to the south. Channeling chamber north of meditation room. Side room to the east, have to go through winding path from meditation room to get to side room.
Evidence 2
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it. Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.
Evidence 3
Name: Newspaper Clipping 1
Description: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.
Evidence 4
Name: Folding Screen
Description: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.
Evidence 5
Name: Black Key
Description: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.
Evidence 6
Name: Newspaper Clipping 2
Description: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel. Articles about the car accident. [info] This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...? 
Evidence 7
Name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
Description: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. A four sectioned mat in front of a platform at the head.
Evidence 8
Name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
Description: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank. Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.
Evidence 9
Name: Pistol
Description: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.
Evidence 10
Name: Knife
Description: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.
Evidence 11
Name: Maya's Costume
Description: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it. Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. This is Maya's robe that she wore on the day of Turner Grey's murder. It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve. The robe is otherwise clean. It is purple in color.
Evidence 12
Name: Lotta's Photo 1
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is a photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot.
Evidence 13
Name: Lotta's Photo 2
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. [caption] This is the second photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot behind her. Maya Fey is standing, pistol in hand, wearing a blood-splattered robe.
Evidence 14
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over. Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.
Evidence 15
Name: Cloth Scrap
Description: Unburned remains found inside the garden incinerator. Small amount of blood is on it.
Evidence 16
Name: Pearl's Ball
Description: Pearl's favorite toy. She was playing with this at the time of the murder, it seems.
Evidence 17
Name: Clothing Box
Description: There is a hole that looks like a bullet hole about 8 inches off the ground.
Evidence 18
Name: License Photo
Description: Ini's photo for her driver's license. Director Hotti's treasured possession.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Like, when the channeling started, I was, like, sleeping in the Side Room.
Person: Ini
Testimony 1
Testimony: Like, a little later, someone came into the room, like, really suddenly.
Person: Ini
Testimony 2
Testimony: It was, like, oh my gawd, totally my sister!
Person: Ini
Testimony 3
Testimony: I, like, hadn't seen her in, like, so long... I was so happy in, like, a sad way...
Person: Ini
Testimony 4
Testimony: I wasn't, like, scared at all. And, like, her costume looked totally, like, normal.
Person: Ini
Testimony 5
Testimony: My sister... She, like, told me something, like, totally terrible.
Person: Ini

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Alright, so I've got this problem here where I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. Let me try to break this down step by step.

First, I'll start by understanding the context. There's a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies related to a murder case involving Maya Fey and Dr. Turner Grey. My task is to identify one evidence and one testimony that contradict each other.

Okay, let's look at the testimonies first. Testimony 5 says, "My sister... She, like, told me something, like, totally terrible." This is from Ini Miney, who is the sister of Mimi Miney, the victim in a car accident. Ini is talking about her sister Mimi, who died a year ago. But wait, Mimi died in a car accident, so how could she be involved in the current murder case? That seems odd.

Now, looking at the evidence, Evidence 6 is a newspaper clipping about Mimi Miney's death. It mentions that Mimi died after falling asleep at the wheel, and there's some suspicion because she worked at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients died due to malpractice. The article also quotes Ini saying she was the passenger and survived, but she claims Mimi was driving.

Here's where I see a contradiction. Testimony 5 suggests that Ini's sister (Mimi) told her something terrible, implying that Mimi was involved in the current events. However, Evidence 6 clearly states that Mimi died a year ago in a car accident. Therefore, Mimi couldn't have been present to tell Ini anything during the current murder investigation. Ini's testimony about her sister being involved seems to contradict the evidence of Mimi's death.

Wait, but I need to make sure I'm interpreting this correctly. Maybe Ini is talking about something else her sister told her before she died? But the way it's phrased, it sounds like it's related to the current situation. Plus, the evidence shows Mimi is deceased, so her being involved in the current events isn't possible.

I should also check other testimonies and evidence to see if there's a more direct contradiction, but this seems like the most obvious one. Testimony 5 is implying Mimi's involvement, while Evidence 6 confirms her death, making her involvement impossible.

So, the contradiction is between Testimony 5, where Ini claims her sister told her something terrible, and Evidence 6, which establishes that Mimi died a year ago and couldn't have been involved in the current murder.
</think>

cot:
Alright, let's tackle this problem step by step. I'm presented with a list of characters, pieces of evidence, and testimonies, and I need to find a pair where the evidence and testimony contradict each other. I'll need to carefully analyze each piece of evidence and see how it aligns or conflicts with the testimonies provided.

First, I'll list out the key points from the evidence and testimonies to make it easier to compare them.

**Evidences:**
1. **Maya's Magatama (Evidence 2):** Slightly translucent, radiates a mysterious light.
2. **Newspaper Clipping 2 (Evidence 6):** Details Mimi Miney's death in a car accident, with Ini Miney as a survivor.
3. **Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report (Evidence 8):** Stabbed in the chest, shot at point-blank with gunpowder residue.
4. **Pistol (Evidence 9):** Murder weapon with two shots fired, Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.
5. **Knife (Evidence 10):** Small fruit knife, Fey's, Maya's fingerprints.
6. **Maya's Costume (Evidence 11):** Blood splatters, bullet hole in sleeve.
7. **Lotta's Photos (Evidence 12, 13):** Show Maya with the pistol, Grey dead.
8. **Sacred Urn (Evidence 14):** Broken by Pearl, under repair.
9. **Cloth Scrap (Evidence 15):** Unburned, blood present.
10. **Pearl's Ball (Evidence 16):** Pearl's toy, played during murder.
11. **Clothing Box (Evidence 17):** Bullet hole at 8 inches.
12. **License Photo (Evidence 18):** Ini's photo, Hotti's possession.

**Testimonies:**
1. **Testimony 0 (Ini):** Side Room was dark.
2. **Testimony 1 (Ini):** Costume is purple, blood blends in.
3. **Testimony 2 (Ini):** Persuaded sister against doing something.
4. **Testimony 3 (Ini):** Took sister to Channeling Chamber.
5. **Testimony 4 (Ini):** Didn't see anyone en route.

Now, I'll look for contradictions. A contradiction would be where the evidence clearly shows something that a testimony denies or where a testimony asserts something that the evidence doesn't support.

Starting with **Testimony 1 (Ini):** "So like, the costume is, like, purple, right? The blood totally blended right in." This testimony is about Maya's costume being purple and the blood blending in. Looking at **Evidence 11 (Maya's Costume):** It describes the robe as purple with blood splatters and a bullet hole in the sleeve. This seems to support the testimony, so no contradiction here.

Next, **Testimony 3 (Ini):** "And then... like, I took my sister to the Channeling Chamber." This implies that Ini and her sister were together and went to the Channeling Chamber. However, **Evidence 6 (Newspaper Clipping 2)** states that Mimi Miney died in a car accident a year ago. If Mimi is dead, Ini couldn't have taken her to the Channeling Chamber. This is a clear contradiction because the evidence shows Mimi was deceased, making Ini's testimony impossible.

Therefore, the contradiction lies between **Evidence 6** and **Testimony 3**.
</think>

cot:
Alright, so I'm trying to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. Let's start by going through the evidence and testimonies provided to see where there might be inconsistencies.

First, I'll look at the evidence. There's a Newspaper Clipping 2 (Evidence 6) that talks about Mimi Miney's death in a car accident. It mentions that she was the driver and fell asleep at the wheel, causing the crash. The article also references an interview with Ini Miney, Mimi's sister, who survived the crash. Ini claims she was asleep in the passenger seat and doesn't remember much after the crash.

Now, looking at the testimonies, Testimony 6 (Ini Miney) states, "I, like, didn't have my license, so, like, I couldn't take over driving for her." This implies that Ini didn't have a driver's license at the time of the accident, which is why she couldn't drive and had to let her sister Mimi drive instead.

Here's where the contradiction comes in. If Ini didn't have a driver's license, she wouldn't have been issued a driver's license photo. However, Evidence 18 is a License Photo described as Ini's photo for her driver's license, which Director Hotti treasures. This directly contradicts Ini's testimony because if she had a driver's license, she would have been able to drive, and there would have been no need for Mimi to drive that night.

So, Evidence 18 (License Photo) contradicts Testimony 6 because the existence of a driver's license photo suggests that Ini did have a license, which she claims she didn't have. This inconsistency could be crucial in determining the validity of her testimony and the circumstances surrounding the car accident.
</think>

Description: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel. Articles about the car accident. [info] This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...?
